entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , La Scie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:58 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Scie 10:30 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023
Temperature: -3.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -5.9°C
Wind: WNW 38 km/h gust 58 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 cm south of Green Bay. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6 except minus 12 in low lying areas. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 6 except minus 12 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023
